src_text: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
ref_text: Sewa sena se tlamme mmuso wa India hore o nke mehato e jwalo ka ho romela batshwari ba dikolobe dibakeng tse amehileng haholo, ba hasanya diketekete tsa matloa a tshwasang menwang le meriana e bolayang dikokonyana.
hyp_text: Tona e tšwanelo e ka kgethapeditswe ke morafe wa India ka lesedi tse ntsweng ka tlase, tse ling tšwanelo e tšwanelwa ke motho wa motho, le tšwanelo e tšwanelwa ke morafe wa motho wa tšwanelo.

src_text: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
ref_text: Hape o takile ditjhelete tsa pampiri tsa dinaha tse ngata, mehlala ya moraorao ya mosebetsi wa hae e kenyeletsang ditshwantsho tsa sefahleho tsa Ditonakgolo tsa bokapele ba di-bili tse ntjha tsa tjhelete tsa Canada tsa $5 le $100.
hyp_text: E ne le kgotso ea le tsebo e e leng e kgethile teng, e ka lekane le ka tsebo ea boraro, e tsejoang ka mokgatlho wa Diphetoho ea Mopresidente wa Kanada e tsebang ka tsamaiso ea $5 le $100.

src_text: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
ref_text: O tlalehwa a ne a le dilemong tsa bo-20. Polelong e entsweng, Bieber o itse "leha ke ne ke le siyo kapa ke ameha ka kotloloho kotsing ena e madimabe, ke lebisa mehopolo ya ka le dithapelo tsa ka ho lelapa la mofu."
hyp_text: E tsebina e e 20 tse 20. Ka tlhapi, Bieber a re ka kopa, 'na ke e lekane ha ke na le e 'nang le e ntle le e ntle le e kopa e tsebina e e e 'nang le e tsebina e e e e 'nang.

src_text: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
ref_text: Ke lahlehetswe ke ausi wa ka le motswalle wa hae, mme ha re le tseleng e tlang mona ho ne ho ba le batho ba babedi ba dutseng diwilitjhereng, mme jwale batho ba tlola ho ya thusa ho ba sututsa," Armand Versace a rialo.
hyp_text: E ne ke lefatseng myaaka le faele, le mokgwa kgosi le mokgwa, le e ne kgona go tswa ka tsamaiso tsa two ba bangwe ba ba le faele, ba ba tlhokang le ba ba tlhamisitseng haeng.

src_text: The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src_text: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
ref_text: Phiramiti e kgolo e ile ya hahuwa ho tlotla Faro Khufu, le diphirimiti tse ngata tse nyane, mabitla hammoho le ditempele di ile tsa hahuwa ho tlotla basadi ba Khufu le ditho tsa lelapa la hae.
hyp_text: Le khumelo ea mokgwa ke e lekile le hlahisoa Khufu, ka le ka khetho tse kholo, tse tšoane, le tšona tša Khufu, le tšona tša batho ba bangwe ba bangwe ba bangwe ba bangwe.

src_text: The age where the events took place is commonly referred as the High Middle Ages the period of European history in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries (AD 1000–1300).
ref_text: Mehla eo diketsahalo tsena di etsahetseng ka yona e atisa ho bitswa Kgubung ya Mehla e Bohareng e leng nako ya nalane ya Yuropa dilemong tsa bo1000–1300 AD kapa ngwahakgolong wa bo11, wa bo12 le wa bo13.
hyp_text: Selemo sa tsebina e nang le tsebina ea hore ho fumanehang ke lefatseng la Mokhatlho a Kopano a Europe, e e kgethileng ka 11, 12, le 13 tsebang (1000-1300 CE).

src_text: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.
ref_text: O mong wa mehlala e tsebahalang haholo wa morao tjena ke letsholo la Atlantic Leboya nakong ya Ntwa ya II ya Lefatshe. Maamerika a ne a leka ho tsamaisa banna le thepa hore e tshele Lewatle la Atlantic ho ya phallela Brithani.
hyp_text: E khotso tse ling tsa mosali, ke tse ling tsa tšona e e neng e etsa lefatseng la Mopeli wa Setšhaba sa II. Ba Ameerika ba tšhoma tšona le tšona e tšwa ka lefatseng la Mopeli a a hlokomeleha lefatseng la Briteine.

src_text: The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour.
ref_text: Mokolokolo wa meaho e etsang sebaka se hlahelletseng hodimo sa Hong Kong e tshwantshwa le chate ya dithutswana e phatsimang e entsweng ke ho ba teng ha metsi a Victoria Harbour.
hyp_text: Le tšepo tša tšepo tša Hong Kong e ka tšwelela ka le tšepo tša tšoatlhodišo e e ka tšwelela ka tša metšo e e ka tšwelela ka tša tša Vitoria Harbour.

src_text: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
ref_text: Maemong a matle o tla kgona ho tsamaya bohole bo bolelele ho ena le ho tsamaya ka maoto – empa ke ka sewelo haholo feela o ka fumanang lebelo la ho thellisa lehlweng dibakeng tse sa tlwaelehang ntle le mokotla o imelang ditseleng tse lokisitsweng.
hyp_text: Ka moro e tšoatlhile, u tšoatlhile ka kgale ke kgalele e tlhapi tša tlase, ke e le kgalele ke e lebeli e e tšoatlhile ka kgalele, ka ke e le e lebeli e e e neng e tšoatlhile ka kgalele.
